title: Go back to school in style with a $24.99 Sam’s Club membership
content:
Macworld

If you’ve ever been back-to-school shopping, you know that all those notebooks, clothes, and lunchbox goodies can add up quickly. The savings and convenience of a Sam’s Club membership can make a big difference, and there’s never been a better time to sign up now that those memberships are a full 50% off thanks to our Back to School sale.

The membership is valid at nearly 600 Sam’s Club locations throughout the U.S., and it gives you access to exclusive savings on more than just school supplies. You can pick up groceries, electronics, furniture, and more, or have it delivered from most of those locations. You can even enjoy Sam’s Club savings on things outside the store like hotel accommodations for that summer vacation you might have in the works.

Through Aug. 13, new members can get a one-year membership to Sam’s Club with automatic renewal for $24.99.
